bibl.title: Letter from Alfred P. Upshur to Emilie Lawrence Reed, September 26, 1927

div1.p: Upshur sends Emilie Lawrence Reed photographs of Belroi and Blue Ridge Summit.

div1.head: Letter from Alfred P. Upshur to Emilie Lawrence Reed, September 26, 1927
div1.opener:
1613 Grove Avenue,
Richmond, Virginia.
September 26, 1927.
Mrs Walter Reed,
Blue Ridge Summit,
Pennsylvania.
My dear Mrs Reed:
div1.p:
I have just gotten back to Richmond,
and upon my return found the picture of the little
house in Gloucester county. I am inclosing a print
of it, and also prints of the pictures of your pretty
house which I took while in Blue Ridge Summit recently.
I am very much pleased with all of these pictures
and with the privilege of taking them.

The picture of you is not so good! However I am
glad to have it anyway.

I had an enlargment made of the picture of the house
in Gloucester in which Dr Reed was born, and I am
mailing it to you under separate cover; it is even better
than the small picture.

Assuring you of my personal regards and of the great
pleasure my visit to you gave me, I am
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours, Alfred P. Upshur
A. P. Upshur. # Dr A. P. Upshur,
Life Extension Institute,
25 West 43rd.St.,
New York City.
